content: Hello Mister Heine, my name is Max Müller from Germany. Thanks for inviting me to see the apartment in Mannheim. Let's talk about the rental price.
name: Max Müller from Germany

content: Thank you for your interest in my apartment, Mr. Müller. I'm sure we can reach a fair agreement on the rental price. How much do you intend to offer?
name: Heinrich Heine

content: Well, considering the size of the apartment and its location, I was thinking of starting at 600 Euro per month. What do you think, Mr. Heine?
name: Max Müller from Germany

content: 600 Euro per month is a reasonable starting point, Mr. Müller. However, I am looking to maximize the return on my investment. Would you be willing to negotiate a higher price?
name: Heinrich Heine

content: Yes, I understand your perspective, Mr. Heine. How about we meet in the middle and start at 650 Euro per month? This would be a fair compromise, I believe. What do you say?
name: Max Müller from Germany

content: Hmm, 650 Euro per month is an interesting offer, Mr. Müller. It's closer to my expectations. Would you be willing to go a bit higher? Perhaps we can find a price that suits both our needs.
name: Heinrich Heine
